title: my computer freezes
body: So i can launch and log in perfectly fine but as soon as i get to the main menu (where it says play up the top) my whole computer freeze and im forced to restart it. everything was working perfectly fine yesterday the only thing thats different is that my computer did an automatic windows update so maybe that had something to do with it? either way riot can you please at least confirm you're working on fixing this because apparently its been happening to a lot of people but i havent seen any response from you guys yet

replies.body:
What OS are you on?

Edit: As in, what version of Windows are you running? XP, Vista, 7, 8.1 or 10?

Have you tried running it in compatibility mode for Windows 7?

Atop that, have you tried running it in admin mode?
